name: Luxury Relaxation Bundle
description: Indulge in luxury and comfort with this package. Includes stays at five-star resorts, spa treatments, and romantic beachside dinners. Perfect for a lavish and relaxing getaway.

name: Cultural Explorer Bundle
description: Explore the rich culture of Bali with this package. Includes visits to museums, art villages, and traditional ceremonies. Enjoy an authentic and immersive cultural experience.

name: Adventure Seeker Bundle
description: Designed for adventure enthusiasts. Includes activities like white-water rafting, volcano hiking, and forest biking tours. Challenge yourself and feel the adrenaline.

name: Family Fun Bundle
description: The perfect family vacation package. Includes visits to amusement parks, zoos, and family-friendly beaches. Fun activities for the entire family.

name: Romantic Getaway Bundle
description: Create beautiful memories with your partner with this romantic package. Includes starlit dinners, boat rides on the lake, and private villa accommodations.

name: Wellness Retreat Bundle
description: Detox and rejuvenate with this wellness package. Includes daily yoga, meditation, and health treatments at renowned spas. Focus on well-being and fitness.

name: Nature Lover Bundle
description: Connect with nature through this package. Includes tours to national parks, snorkeling at coral reefs, and bird-watching. Discover the natural wonders of Bali.
